file_content.text:
Emergency Protocols Active
A form 98BG-HM7 has been filed, designating the current emergency as a hostile invasion by ground forces. Power has been routed to the ground defense network to repel the invaders. NOTICE: Readings on the power draw indicate that the ground-defense network is not in place. Protocols require that ground-defense turrets be placed on the local power nodes and kept in good working order.
